oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lieutenant Thomas Branson Cooke
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lieutenant Thomas Branson Cooke, C. S. A., taken in Nashville at age 16. He was killed two years later at the Battle of Port Hudson. His parents lived on Gallatin Pike in Nashville, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
